title: Academics - ex forti dulcedo.
description: Maarten Steenhagen is a philosopher and writer. This is his website. You will find notes, essays, and academic papers.

items.title: Fictional Creations
items.summary: Many people assume that fictional entities are encapsulated in the world of fiction. I show that this cannot be right. Some works of fiction tell us about pieces of poetry, music, or theatre written by fictional characters. Such creations are fictional creations, as I will call them. Their authors do not exist. But that does not take away that we can perform, recite, or otherwise generate actual instances of such works.
